issue.title: [Documentation] Java prose docs are not easily reachable from website
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9364](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9364). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/>, in the sidebar, clicking "Java" takes you to the API documentation. You have to search for certain terms to find pages like [https://arrow.apache.org/docs/java/vector_schema_root.html](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/java/vector_schema_root.html).

comments.body:
